Title: Kindergarten Cop 2
Writer: David H. Steinberg (screenplay), Timothy Harris (based on the film written by), Murray Salem (based on the film written by), Murray Salem (story), Herschel Weingrod (based on the film written by)
Actors: Dolph Lundgren, Darla Taylor, Bill Bellamy, Aleks Paunovic
Plot: Assigned to recover sensitive stolen data, a gruff FBI agent goes undercover as a kindergarten teacher, but the school's liberal, politically correct environment is more than he bargained for.
Production: Capital Arts Entertainment, Universal 1440 Entertainment, Imagine Entertainment
